testimonialList.text: I would highly recommend Katherine. She's very knowledgeable about a range of different products to suit individual needs. She's helped me combine my pensions into the best one available and I feel confident she has helped me make the right decision.
testimonialList.name: N Codd

testimonialList.text: Katherine is simply great! She's the smartest, most patient and kindest financial adviser you could ever wish to work with. I'd use her again in a heartbeat!
testimonialList.name: N Dietrich

testimonialList.text: Katherine did a superb job sorting out life insrurance for my husband and I. We really didn't know what she needed and Katherine was able to take out budget and find something suitable to suit our family setup. She was knowledgeable and helpful and follow things through with our queries and those of the insurance company until everything was in place. I would definitely recommend her services. Thank you!
testimonialList.name: C Cordell
